Package io.github.ai4ci.util

Interface Repository.SerializableFunction<X,Y>

Type Parameters:
X - the input type of the function (usually the entity type)
Y - the return type of the function (the indexed key type)
All Superinterfaces:
Function<X,Y>, Serializable
Enclosing class:
Repository
public static interface Repository.SerializableFunction<X,Y> extends Serializable, Function<X,Y>
A serializable function interface that extends both Serializable and Function. This is used to allow lambda expressions to be serialized and used as keys for indexing.
